Package me.drkapdor.funbazeapi.api.npc.modifier

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimationModifier
    A modifier for various animations a me.kapdor.rpjobs.api.npc can play.
    EquipmentModifier
    A modifier for modifying the equipment of a player.
    LabyModModifier
    A modifier for modifying playing labymod emotes and stickers.
    MetadataModifier
    A modifier for modifying the metadata of a player.
    MetadataModifier.EntityMetadata<I,O>
    A wrapper for entity metadata.
    NPCModifier
    An NPCModifier queues packets for NPC modification which can then be send to players via the NPCModifier.send(Player...) method.
    RotationModifier
    A modifier for modifying the rotation of a player.
    VisibilityModifier
    A modifier for modifying the visibility of a player.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AnimationModifier.EntityAnimation
    All official supported entity animations.
    LabyModModifier.LabyModAction
    A LabyMod action which can be played to a user using an me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc.
    VisibilityModifier.PlayerInfoAction
    A wrapper for all available player info actions.
